===Etymology===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|あだ}}
{{IPAchar|/ata/}} → {{IPAchar|/ada/}}

A sound shift in the {{w|Edo period}} from earlier form ''ata'', itself from classical verb {{m|ja|当つ|tr=atsu}}, which became modern {{m|ja|当たる|tr=ataru||to be against}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|あだ|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|あだ}}

# an [[opponent]], an [[enemy]], a [[foe]]
# [[harm]], [[injury]]
# [[terrible]] [[treatment]] (of someone or something)
# [[hate]] towards someone, a [[grudge]]

====Usage notes====
The spelling {{m|ja|仇}} is much more common.

* {{sense|hate}} {{m|ja|怨み|tr=urami}}
* {{sense|grudge}} {{m|ja|怨恨|tr=enkon}}, {{m|ja|遺恨|tr=ikon}}
